page.title: 16Housing.
page.content: Much of the housing is generally old, especially the farm buildings,cottages included in our grid and a portion of the centre of the village.Many of the houses were constructed in the last century and consist mainly of stone blocks,with slate roofs. The oldest building in the village is{"The Old Forge",}occupied by {Mr. {and Mrs.R.Southall.}This being originally established in the fourteenth century. Many new brick bungalows are being constructed and the limits of the village constantly expand.Also there is evidence of derelict property being rebuilt and used as retirement or holiday accommodation.Recently there has been an influx of towns' people seeking retirement or retreat to the rural areas.Consequently old property values have become inflated.
